Other: land use change specified according to LUH2 forcing data

Land use transitions from LUH2 forcing data set are imposed on the vegetation anually; the land use types employed by the model are primary (natural, undisturbed), croplands, pastures, and secondary (disturbed but recovering) vegetation. Croplands and pastures are harvested, indirectly influencing all surface properties, including albedo.
